attributes.action: first aid training in  secondary school's
attributes.additional_details:
WE THE UNDERSIGNED ARE ASKING THE GOVERNMENT TO LOOK IN TO MAKING FIRST AID  TRAINING PART OF THE NATIONAL CURRICULUM  FOR ALL SECONDARY SCHOOL’S

IF WE CAN TRAIN THE YOUNGER GENERATION  IN FIRST AID  THEY WILL BE ABLE TO HELP SAVE A LIFE OR TO KEEP A CASUALTY COMFORTABLE AND SAFE UNTIL PROFFESIONAL HELP ARRIVES AND TAKES OVER.
